document.full_text: christopher tierney, the actor who was hurt when he fell during a december performance of "spider-man: turn off the dark," has undergone dna testing as part of his recovery.
document.title: injured 'spider-man' actor undergoes dna testing
lines_and_colors: christopher tierney, the actor who was hurt when he fell during a december performance of "spider-man: turn off the dark," has undergone dna testing as part of his recovery.
